apac_dns_desc: From May 8–9, 2025, Hanoi became the center of the Asia-Pacific IT industry with the APAC DNS Forum 2025 – the largest international forum on the Domain Name System (DNS) organized by ICANN in collaboration with VNNIC.
aifeex_gala_desc: Under the brilliant lights of the National Convention Center on the evening of March 16, more than 1,500 guests created a memorable gala night together.
singwow_desc: On April 26 at ChillHouse – 179 Hai Ba Trung, District 3, the "SingWow clans" together created creative graffiti masterpieces.
maritime_caption: 70th Anniversary of Vietnam Maritime Safety Tradition
maritime_desc: On May 9–10, 2025, the Vietnam Maritime Safety Corporation solemnly held the 70th Anniversary of the Maritime Safety Tradition. The event was a great success, gathering 500 industry delegates.
apscvir_desc: From April 25–27, 2025, the APSCVIR Annual Scientific Conference was successfully held in Da Nang, gathering over 1,200 leading experts and doctors in interventional radiology.
